name: No Look Grow
description:
Grow when your hooman isn't looking, or else he will throw you out! 

this is far from a perfect project, especially the climbing physics I just can't figure it out until the end lol. 

How to play:

Hold left click while moving your mouse to control the left leaf and hold right click while moving your mouse to control the right leaf to climb.

Credits:

  • "Surf Rock Light" BGM by Tim Beek
  • "Little Apprentice" BGM by Tim Beek
  • "Mentimun" Font by Khurasan
